ComicInfo.Title: Hopman Bog
ComicInfo.Summary: The exclusive four-issue prequel to the upcoming blockbuster horror film THE CRAZIES from Overture Films begins here. Meet Rory Hamill, aka 'Patient Zero', the first victim of a pathogenic rage that will change the world as we know it. Something is wrong with the water supply in Hopman Bog and the ramifications are lethal for all involved. Can a simple farmer stand in the way of a biological terror the likes of which have never been seen before? The results will not be for the squeamish.
